mapper.select: select distinct a.tag_code, a.tag_name,b.tag_use_num from use_tag_record a left join tag_info b on a.tag_code = b.tag_code where a.del_flag = 0 and a.use_object_code = #{useObjectCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a.tag_type_code = #{tagTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select tag_code, tag_name, tag_type_code, tag_type_name, use_object_code, use_object_name, count(*) as tag_use_num from use_tag_record where del_flag = 0 and tag_code = #{tagCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} group by tag_code,tag_name,tag_type_code,tag_type_name,use_object_code,use_object_name
